title: Community Guidelines & Safety
description: Our rules and safety features to ensure JOYIN remains a positive space for everyone.
content:
Our Community Principles

JOYIN is built on respect, safety, and authentic connection. We expect all users to:

  • Treat others with respect and kindness
  • Share authentic content
  • Respect intellectual property rights
  • Follow local laws and regulations

Prohibited Content

The following content is not allowed on JOYIN:

  • Hate Speech: Content that attacks people based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, etc.
  • Harassment & Bullying: Targeted abuse or intimidation
  • Violent Content: Graphic violence, threats, or dangerous organizations
  • Adult Content: Nudity or sexually explicit material
  • Illegal Activities: Content promoting illegal goods or services
  • Spam & Misinformation: Repetitive unwanted content or false information that could cause harm

Reporting Content

If you see content that violates our guidelines:

  1. Tap the three dots (...) on the post, comment, or profile
  2. Select 'Report'
  3. Choose the reason for your report
  4. Submit your report

Our moderation team reviews all reports and takes appropriate action.

Blocking & Restricting Users

If someone is bothering you:

  • Block: Prevents the user from seeing your content or contacting you
  • Restrict: Limits a user's interactions without them knowing
  • Mute: Hides someone's posts from your feed without unfollowing

Appeals Process

If your content was removed or your account was restricted, you can appeal the decision through our Contact Support page.
